Lafayette.Valsin Broussard House:
The Valsin Broussard House in Broussard, Louisiana, located at 408 W. Main St., was built in about 1876. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.
It was listed "for its historical significance as the home of the founder of the town." It was built by Valsin Broussard and is the oldest house in the town.
